sentences.sContent: The company’s lawyers tried to discredit her testimony.
sentences.sCn: 公司的律师试图质疑她的证词。

synos.tran: 怀疑；无信用；名声的败坏

remMethod.val: dis (不) + cred (相信) + it → 不信

words.tran: 丢脸的；不名誉的；有损信用的；败坏名声的

trans.tranCn: 不信； 使成为不可信； 败坏…的声誉
trans.tranOther: to make people stop respecting or trusting someone or something
the loss of other people’s respect or trust
